授業目的: Students will understand how to use concepts and principles of politics and some economics, together with plausible evidence, to describe the interactions of political and economic actors and to explain the economic and political regime of the postwar Japan.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the various ways to explain the economic growth of the postwar Japan.　They will also be able to discuss what is wrong and/or what went wrong since the 1990s.  Students will be able to understand the various ways to examine political regime of the postwar Japan.　They will also be able to think critically about competing theories of development （economists, sociologists, political scientists.
特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（政治経済）（CIEC）/Political Economy of Japan（国際学部）
授業方法: Upon reading the required reading, the students are expected to participate in the class.

第2回:

第3回: Dominant Explanations for the Political of Japan
第8回:
